entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Scott
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Scott AAFC 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
